text: The Hyatt Regency Dallas is a 28-story, 1,120-room hotel at the Reunion district in Dallas, Texas. It was featured in the opening credits of the television series Dallas for the show's entire run, from 1978 until 1991. The building is connected to Union Station and Reunion Tower, the city's landmark observation tower. The Y-shaped building has an atrium on the south side. A low rise ballroom with was added in 1998. The Hyatt Regency Dallas recently completed a $50-million renovation that features a newly re-designed and re- configured guestrooms, bathrooms and corridors. ==References== ==External links== * * Hyatt Regency Dallas official site * Hyatt Regency Dallas Photos Category:Skyscraper hotels in Dallas Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1978 Category:Hyatt Hotels and Resorts
